head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths SHERMAN, REBECCA A.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths SHERMAN, REBECCA A.

block.p: SHERMAN-Rebecca A. On Saturday, June 24, 2000, North Caldwell, New Jersey. Loving wife of fortyseven years of Harry Sherman Jr. Devoted mother of William R. of Maplewood, N.J., Catherine A. of Cedar Grove, N.J., Susan J. of Wilmington, Delaware. Sister of Teresa Beers of Belvidere, New Jersey. Relatives and friends are invited to attend the memorial service St. Peters Church, 271 Roseland Ave. Essex Fells, New Jersey on Friday at 1:00 PM. Interment Fairmont Cemetery. Friends may call 10:00-12:00 noon at the O'Boyle funeral home, 309 Broad Street, Bloomfield, New Jersey. In lieu of flowers the family requests memorial donations be made to the Salvation Army, P.O. Box 3170 Union, N.J. 07083, attn: Nancy Wellbrook, director of development.
